name: tonix-gulp-html-autoprefixer
description: Gulp plugin to Autoprefix all CSS inside an HTML page - CSS inside style tags and inside style attributes. Uses tonix-html-autoprefixer under the hood.

scripts.publish-git: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run publish-git
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm run publish-git
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm run publish-git

author: motdotla
